title: Winter vegetable casserole
ingredients: ['2 onions, each cut into 6 wedges', '3 carrots, cut into chunks', '3 celery sticks, cut into chunks', '400 g (14 oz) sweet potato or swede, cut into chunks', '1 litre (1¾ pints) hot vegetable stock, preferably home-made', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '3 leeks, about 300 g (10½ oz) in total, thickly sliced', '150 g (5½ oz) pearl barley', '2 tsp dried sage', 'salt and pepper', '3 tbsp coarsely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley to garnish']
